description: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files. It allows developers to create new diagrams and work with VSD, VSDX, VSS, VST, VSX, VTX, VDW and VDX files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the diagram, from lines and fills, to more complex elements, and then export to VDX, VSX, VTX, XPS, HTML, SVG, SWF, XAML, image or PDF formats.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements,task and bug fixes as detailed below:
   
    Enhancements
   DIAGRAMNET-50129-Add support to get Master by its name
   DIAGRAMNET-50130-Add support to check Master presence by its name
   DIAGRAMNET-50131-Add support to dynamically glue group shapes inside the container 
    Bugs
   DIAGRAM-108-Install Aspose.Diagram product in the correct place
   DIAGRAMNET-50113-VSDX to PNG conversion, shapes are missing
   DIAGRAMNET-50114-VSDX to PNG conversion, shape's text is rotated
   DIAGRAMNET-50118-Can't read shape properties from VSDX file
   DIAGRAMNET-50122-EULA 14 May, 2014 Update
   DIAGRAMNET-50125-VSDX to PDF conversion, shapes are missing
   DIAGRAMNET-50126-VSDX to Image format conversion, shapes are missing
   DIAGRAMNET-50127-VSDX to PDF conversion, shapes fill color is black instead of white
   DIAGRAMNET-50128-VSDX to Image conversion, shapes fill color is black instead of white
   DIAGRAMNET-50140-VSD to Pdf conversion, arrow thickness is ignored in the output
   DIAGRAMNET-50141-VSD to PNG conversion, white space around the actual drawing
   DIAGRAMNET-50142-VSDX to PNG conversion, white space around the actual drawing
   DIAGRAMNET-50144-Exception message occurred while loading VSDX diagram
summary: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files.
title: Aspose.Diagram for .NET
